description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with OKANAGAN HALFWAY HOUSE SOCIETY CRF. The average
  contract duration was 2.63 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.4M.
  The longest contract was 3.42 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.1M.
